live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41464.summary: Customers in the Mount Pleasant area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to their  Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41464.title: Sept 06 – Vancouver (Mount Pleasant surroundings) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
